posts.post_content:
Looking to buy the following Fred Merkle cards:

T215 Red Cross
T213 Coupon Type-3 Factory 8 Overprint.

I will pay well for either card, or will gladly trade rare cards or backs or whatever you prefer.

Hi Sean,

Shoot me an email at [url]rgutheil@gmail.com[/url]

Rob

I can't believe this thread worked, but here it is:

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=163691&d=1412810413[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=163692&d=1412810423[/IMG]

Thank you Rob.

I am still looking for a T215 Red Cross Merkle and T215 Red Cross Street.

If anyone has a Merkle, could you please send me a scan, even if you have no plans to sell? I'm trying to verify if the Merkle was printed as a Type-2, or only as a Type-1.  Thank you.  :)
2 1/2 year bump: I'm still looking for t215 Red Cross Merkle and Street.  :(

Hey Sean --- at least that Merkle is really nice!!

When you finish these runs I want you to invert the image for either Merkle or Street and line them up so it looks like they are playing catch.

Good luck - you know my eyes are peeled for ya!
